#summary The outline property is a shorthand property for setting 'outline-style', 'outline-width', and 'outline-color'.
#labels about-css,is-css-property,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [CSSReference CSS Reference] > [CSSProperties Properties] > *outline*

== Usage ==

== Values ==

  * `[ 'outline-color' || 'outline-style' || 'outline-width' ]`
  * `inherit`
